name: Fruit Run (Insane)
description:
A Basic 2D Platformer (Beta)

Journey through the various levels avoiding dangerous traps and enemies while collecting as much of the fruits as possible.

Controls:

'A' & 'D' To Move Left/Right,

'W' To Jump/Double Jump.

Important Notice: 

This is A Beta!

Only 10 levels are available, there may bugs and the game may change in the future.
